snippet: A national crackdown on the devastating flow of illegal guns is long overdue.
abstract: Editorial welcomes reported package of gun control measures that task force led by Vice Pres Joseph Biden Jr appears to be prepared to recommend; contends that final recommendations should include long-overdue measure to curb illegal gun trade.
lead_paragraph: A national crackdown on the devastating flow of illegal guns is long overdue.

headline.print_headline: The Bid to Stop Gun Trafficking
headline.seo: The Bid to Stop Gun Trafficking
headline.main: The Bid to Stop Gun Trafficking
